testcase.name: Verify valid login from admin login page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on admin login page..............................................passed When I enter admin@yourstore.com into username field on the login page......passed And I enter admin into password field on the login page.....................passed And I click on login button on login page...................................passed Then I verify valid login message on sign in page...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify invalid login for multiple users
testcase.system-out: Given I am on admin panel page..............................................passed When I enter bob@gmail.com into username text fields on admin login page....passed And I enter test123 into password text fields on admin login page...........passed And I click on login button on admin login page.............................passed Then I verify that I used invalid credentials...............................passed

testcase.name: Verify invalid login for multiple users 2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on admin panel page..............................................passed When I enter jimil@yhaoo.com into username text fields on admin login page..passed And I enter 243red into password text fields on admin login page............passed And I click on login button on admin login page.............................passed Then I verify that I used invalid credentials...............................passed

testcase.system-out: Given I am on admin panel page..............................................passed When I enter liz@gmail.com into username text fields on admin login page....passed And I enter 123Test into password text fields on admin login page...........passed And I click on login button on admin login page.............................passed Then I verify that I used invalid credentials...............................passed
